bibl.title: "Pastos".
bibl.note: "Pastos" always appears as a woven fabric of some sort, customarily connected with marriage. It can never be shown to refer to a chamber, shrine, or other permanent, non-textile structure. - Appendix (pp. 120-123): The "pastophoroi".
bibl.seg: "Pastos" always appears as a woven fabric of some sort, customarily connected with marriage. It can never be shown to refer to a chamber, shrine, or other permanent, non-textile structure. - Appendix (pp. 120-123): The "pastophoroi".
